body_html: Where did you run this piece of code? Please avoid using DataLoader in interactive python interpreters like IPython and also remember to wrap the for loop that consumes the DataLoader with an if statement if __name__ == '__main__:.
body_text: Where did you run this piece of code? Please avoid using DataLoader in interactive python interpreters like IPython and also remember to wrap the for loop that consumes the DataLoader with an if statement if __name__ == '__main__:.
body: Where did you run this piece of code? Please avoid using DataLoader in interactive python interpreters like IPython and also remember to wrap the for loop that consumes the DataLoader with an if statement `if __name__ == '__main__:`.
